backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor, serving as a placeholder backend canister with no methods implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Machine-readable report describing two implemented UI features (Yes button success message and kiss animation), listing affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files, outlining app behavior, theming, Tailwind configuration, and the kiss shower animation component.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS variables defining a neutral light/dark theme with extensive OKLCH color tokens for layout, charts, and sidebar styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that sets the page title, viewport metadata, and mounts the React app to the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component implementing the Valentine’s Day UI with evasive No button logic and a Yes-triggered success state showing a love message, animations, and the kiss shower.
frontend/src/components/KissShower.tsx: React component that spawns and animates multiple falling kiss emoji particles using CSS animations without blocking user interaction.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that creates and caches a backend actor using React Query, recreating it when the user’s Internet Identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context, hooks, and a provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, login state, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Frontend global styles defining a Valentine’s Day color theme, Google Fonts, and the kiss-fall keyframe animation used by the kiss shower effect.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Frontend entry point that initializes React with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling class-based dark mode, scanning frontend source files, and extending the theme with custom fonts, OKLCH-based color tokens, container settings, shadows, border radii, and UI animations. Includes plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing an ICP starter app with a Motoko backend canister and a React (Vite) + Tailwind/shadcn UI frontend, including auth, actor integration, and build/deploy templates. Tracks existing features and pending Valentine-themed UI feature requests with versioning.
